description: With decades of experience in the fields of genome sequencing, CD Genomics is devoted to providing the accurate and affordable microbial whole genome sequencing service. We combine both Illumina (short reads) and PacBio (long reads) platforms for microbial re-sequencing and complete genome de novo sequencing . Our strong expertise is enhanced by flexible sequencing strategies and professional bioinformatics pipelines.  We can tailor this pipeline to your research interest. If you have additional requirements or questions, please feel free to contact us.
name: Microbial Whole Genome Sequencing
